thread.title: Blac Chyna celebrates weight loss with racy shoot
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna celebrates weight loss with racy shoot | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Blac Chyna celebrates weight loss with racy shoot
text:
Blac Chyna has celebrated her 40lb weight loss with a nude photo shoot.
The 28-year-old stripped off and slipped between the sheets for a photo shoot posted on her Instagram page on Wednesday.
The star has dropped from 192lbs to 152.4lbs since the arrival of daughter Dream in November.
Scroll down for video
Celebrating her body: Blac Chyna has celebrated her 40lb weight loss with a racy photo shoot that she shared with her Instagram fans
Confident: The newly single star put her slimmed down body on show
The reality star shared the weight update on her Snapchat on Tuesday after hopping on the scales.
The 5' 2" mother-of-two also shared that she is hoping to lose 20 more pounds by Summer 2017.
Chyna's weight loss reveal comes amid reports of a split from fiancé Rob Kardashian.
News of the separation was reported by Us Weekly on Thursday, citing 'multiple sources.'
'Rob thinks it's the right decision,' according to one insider.
'Chyna has disappeared for days at a time without communicating or providing any updates. This won't end well.'
Weight loss goals: The 28-year-old revealed she has lost 40lbs and is down to 152.4 with her Snapchat fans on Tuesday
More to go: The 5' 2" mother-of-two also shared that she is hoping to lose 20 more pounds by Summer 2017 (seen recently on the left and right after Dream's birth on the right)
Tiny waist: The pint-sized star has been showing off her curves quite a bit lately and has been posing for shots showing a decidedly slimmer figure
Another source claimed that the two had been not getting along since their first split in early December.
'[It's the same] with her yelling and screaming about how his family doesn’t like or support her, and his insecurities,' the source said.
At the time Rob famously released a heartbreaking video clip on Snapchat showing his empty home and Dream's bare nursery.
They got back together just a few days before Christmas leading some to speculate that the split was a promo stunt for Keeping Up With The Kardashians and their own reality show, Rob & Chyna.
However, the two have been living separately as Chyna moved back into her home and Rob lives in the Calabasas estate his mother, Kris Jenner, bought for him last February.
The couple enjoyed a whirlwind romance. Rob began dating the 28-year-old model in January 2016, and they got engaged on April 5. They announced they were expecting a baby a month later and Dream was born on November 10.
The two have been living separately as Chyna moved back into her home and Rob lives in the Calabasas estate his mother, Kris Jenner, bought for him last February (pictured in May 2016)
